name: Pack Panic
description:
How to play :

You only play with mouse !

Click on the yellow button to buy bottles.

You then need to put 2, 4, or 6 bottles in the bottle packagers depending on what the clients need.

Once the packs are done, you can place them on the table on the left of the screen, or directly to the clients.

We really hope you'll like our game. First jam and first finished game for us ! 

Post your highscores in the comments !

Programmation : me

Art : https://intempestif.itch.io

Music : GroBig (he doesn't want to create a Soundcloud, encourage him in the comments :p)
